attributes.action: Continue with ema bonuses as an incentive for those students with a less priveleged background
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today it has been reported that ema bonuses will be scrapped to save money.Our son relies on this money over the summer as he does not receive ema over the summer months.Yet the government expect children to stay in school now till 18.When you have a low household income,this is discriminating against working households while rewarding the idle jobless as their offspring will receive free school dinners,free prescriptions,full rate ema.Their parents receive free housing,free council tax.Perhaps my partner should resign from his job,or would I be better off as a single parent?
